short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to use Twilio Video screen sharing locally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Lesson aLive website serves as a comprehensive platform where tutors/experts and learners can register and engage in online sessions through video conferencing, accompanied by a convenient screen sharing feature. This extension specifically caters to the essential needs of video conferencing and screen sharing functionalities. Both tutors/experts and learners are required to register on the website. Tutors/experts have the ability to schedule classes directly on the website, while learners can easily register for classes on available dates. Additionally, the recorded classes offer a valuable resource for future reference.
